tProcessDefinition.name: ManualPacking
tProcessDefinition.Documentation: This is a dummy Manual Model.

Intention.name: sealAndSortPackets
Intention.Documentation: The primary goal/intention is to seal and sort the packets as per the business rule.

SubIntention.name: highHRUtilization
SubIntention.Documentation: Work must be done in such a way that no employees sit idle in the premises of company.

SubIntention.name: highThroughput
SubIntention.Documentation: Throughput time must be increased to remain competitive in the market.

InitialContext.Documentation: The following contexts are required to decide this process is okay for the purpose or not.

tProcessDefinition.Documentation: This is a dummy semi automated model without repair activity.

SubIntention.name: highAutomation
SubIntention.Documentation: Work must be automated more to gain larger productivity.

SubIntention.name: highThroughput
SubIntention.Documentation: Throughput time must be increased to remain competitive in the market.

InitialContext.Documentation: The following contexts are required to decide this process is okay for the purpose or not.
